org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowCamera.ShadowParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowCamera.ShadowParameters
  • Enclosing class:
    ShadowCamera

    @Implements(value=android.hardware.Camera.Parameters.class)
public static class ShadowCamera.ShadowParameters
extends java.lang.Object

    Shadows the Android Camera.Parameters class.
